name: TCD+
description:
Hey ! Are you ready to shoot some monsters ?

Just press on the buttons that are showed up (for the first one, you need to press on the letter z of your keyboard + the letter m) 

It's better to play with friends ! 

If you can't press more than 3 buttons on your keyboard, it's normal, some keyboards doesn't support multi-touch :<, just ask a friend for a new keyboard !

Please download this font for full pleasure :

https://www.dafont.com/squarefont.font

With love, Kizu and Thomas Lean

https://twitter.com/ThomasLean

https://twitter.com/kizupixels
